content.value:
La Clave Hostel has a 24-hour front desk so you don't have to worry about your arrival or departure, a living room to meet and share with new people, practice languages and exchange experiences. Our 55'' screen is available to enjoy the best sports events, series, and movie nights. It is a fact that you're still missing Cali if you have not spent yet a sunset with cold beers on our terrace. La Clave is the perfect place for you to enjoy all amenities, an open kitchen, a laundry area, delicious Colombian restaurant service, and bathrooms with hot water and toiletries.

We have 3 types of rooms in our hostel, 4-bed female dormitory room, 6-bed mixed dormitory room and standard double room with share bathroom. All of them are designed for the rest of our guests.

-Taxes 19% for Colombians.
-Foreigners are exempt from taxes.
-Breakfast included only for Private Rooms.
-Reception open 24/7.
-No curfew.
-The maximum period of stay is of 14 days.

Cali Fair from the week of December 24th to December 31st is required 50% deposit.
Payment by bank transfer. Property will be in touch for further details.
